# numberOfMajorTickMarks

**Instance Property**

The number of major tick marks displayed by the control.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var numberOfMajorTickMarks: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value in this property must be less than or equal to the value in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSLevelIndicatorCell/numberOfTickMarks] property.

## Managing Tick Marks

- **tickMarkPosition**: The placement of tick marks on the level indicator control.
- **numberOfTickMarks**: The number of tick marks displayed by the control.
- **tickMarkValue(at:)**: Returns the receiver’s value represented by the tick mark at index (the minimum-value tick mark has an index of 0).
- **rectOfTickMark(at:)**: Returns the bounding rectangle of the tick mark identified by `index` (the minimum-value tick mark is at index 0).
